meanings.definition: To give a brief statement of the main points of something.
meanings.sent1: She summarizes the story by telling only the important parts.
meanings.sent2: He always summarizes the news for his friends who missed it.
meanings.sent3: The cat summarizes its day by napping in the sun.
meanings.sent4: His painting beautifully summarizes the essence of nature.
meanings.sent5: The teacher summarizes the lesson with a catchy song.

meanings.definition: To make a summary of something.
meanings.sent1: The report summarizes the key findings of the research.
meanings.sent2: The student summarizes the chapter before the exam.
meanings.sent3: The robot summarizes the instructions in a robotic voice.
meanings.sent4: Her smile summarizes her happiness in a single expression.
meanings.sent5: The map summarizes the entire journey in a single image.
